FuncDef:
The option82-identify include static-user command inserts Option 82 for static users.
The undo option82-identify include static-user command removes Option 82 from static users.
By default, static user packets do not carry Option 82.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a QoS profile is applied to a BAS interface and different identification modes are specified for different users, static users cannot be identified using any of the identification modes but can be identified by Option 82. To allow the BAS interface to add Option 82 to static user packets to identify the static users, run the option82-identify include static-user command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
